# GIUC (Gautham's Important Utility Collection)

GIUC is a collection of many mathematical functions. They are :
    1. fibonacci
    2. factorial
    3. isPrime
    3. palindrome
    3. isLeapYear
    4. isArmstrong
    5. isPerfect
    6. isStrong
    7. isHappy
    8. isHarshad
    9. isPronic
    10. isAbundant
    11. isDeficient
    12. legrangeInterpolation
    13. newtonInterpolation
    14. bisection
    15. newtonRaphson
    16. secant
    17. lagrangePolynomial
    18. newtonPolynomial
    19. trapezoidalRule
    20. simpsonsRule
    21. eulerMethod
    22. rungeKuttaMethod
    23. trapezoidalRule2D
    24. simpsonsRule2D
    25. eulerMethod2D
